text: Arizona's 22nd Legislative District is one of 30 in the state, situated in north central Maricopa County. As of 2018 there are 48 precincts in the district, with a total registered voter population of 153,061. ==Political representation== The district is represented for the 2019-2021 Legislative Session in the State Senate by David Livingston (R) and in the House of Representatives by Ben Toma (R) and Frank Carroll (R). ==References== Category:Maricopa County, Arizona Category:Arizona legislative districts
title: Arizona's 22nd legislative district
